Articles.Content:
Apologies if this has been posted/suggested already. I tried to search.

suggestion:  Update the Mk3 cargo ramp to work like robotics parts including traverse rate, deploy angle (angle limit), Motorized, Lock, and On Power Loss. 

I'd love to land on a planet and just let the unmotorized ramp figure out what my deploy angle should be (by letting it drop open). Then I can Lock the ramp to that angle. Since the angle may differ for each location I land I can't ideally set a default angle. Also, the traverse rate + manually adjusting the ramp causes inadvertent movement of the vehicle. 

Thanks for considering!
